com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface InitializableFromDisk<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidLibraryRule, AndroidResourceRule, DefaultJavaLibraryRule, DexProducedFromJavaLibraryThatContainsClassFiles, DummyRDotJava, JavaTestRule, PrebuiltJarRule, PreDexMerge, ResourcesFilter, RobolectricTestRule, ShBinaryRule, UberRDotJava

    public interface InitializableFromDisk<T>
    Object that has in-memory data structures that need to be populated as a result of executing its steps. An object that implements this interface will always have its internal data structures initialized through this interface, regardless of whether it was built locally or read from cache. This ensures that a rule is always in the same state once isRuleBuilt() returns true.

    Objects that implement this interface should create getter methods that delegate to getBuildOutput() to access the in-memory data structures rather than have clients invoke getBuildOutput() directly. This ensures that all getters go through any protections provided by getBuildOutput(). (If this were an abstract class, getBuildOutput() would be protected.)

    This implementation is heavy-handed to ensure that certain invariants are maintained when creating, setting, and getting the build output. Specifically, implementations of this interface should look like the following: 

     @Nullable
 private T buildOutput;

 @Override
 public T initializeFromDisk(OnDiskBuildInfo onDiskBuildInfo) {
   // ...add your magic here...
   return t;
 }

 @Override
 public void setBuildOutput(T buildOutput) {
   Preconditions.checkState(this.buildOutput == null,
       "buildOutput should not already be set for %s.",
       this);
   this.buildOutput = buildOutput;
 }

 @Override
 public T getBuildOutput() {
   Preconditions.checkState(buildOutput != null, "buildOutput must already be set for %s.", this);
   return buildOutput;
 }

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getBuildOutput() 
      T initializeFromDisk(OnDiskBuildInfo onDiskBuildInfo) 
      void setBuildOutput(T buildOutput)
      This should be invoked only by the build engine (currently, AbstractCachingBuildRule) that invoked initializeFromDisk(OnDiskBuildInfo).

    • Method Detail

      • initializeFromDisk

        T initializeFromDisk(OnDiskBuildInfo onDiskBuildInfo)
        Parameters:
        onDiskBuildInfo - can be used to read metadata from disk to help initialize the rule.
        Returns:
        an object that has the in-memory data structures that need to be populated as a result of executing this object's steps.

      • setBuildOutput

        void setBuildOutput(T buildOutput)
                    throws IllegalStateException
        This should be invoked only by the build engine (currently, AbstractCachingBuildRule) that invoked initializeFromDisk(OnDiskBuildInfo).

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method has already been invoked.

      • getBuildOutput

        T getBuildOutput()
                 throws IllegalStateException
        Returns:
        the value passed to setBuildOutput(Object).
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if setBuildOutput(Object) has not been invoked yet.
